thread.title: Family weekend in NYC -
thread.title_full: Family weekend in NYC - Review of Shelburne NYC-an Affinia hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: splendora7212
title: Family weekend in NYC -
text: Affinia Shelburne is a convenient, spacious hotel for a family stay. It's not easy to find economical hotel rooms that will provide sleeping arrangements for a family of 4 (teenagers and parents). Beds are very comfortable. The staff is friendly and helpful - can leave your bags for the day if you arrive early or leave late. Wine hour is a nice touch after a long day of walking and before a nice dinner. Close enough to public transport.
